info.title: Eval Hub

get.description: Get the status of an evaluation request.

schema.description: If `true`, delete the evaluation job permanently so that `GET /api/v1/evaluations/jobs/{id}` will return a 404.
schema.title: Hard Delete

post.description:
Update the evaluation job status or results.

Note that this endpoint is internal and should not be used by clients,
eventually it will not be possible to call this endpoint without a special token.
